record.jsxtip: Fires after the user double-clicks a record or presses the Enter key with focus in a record of this button panel.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record. When more than one record is executed, this variable is set to just one of the executed records. Use strRECORDIDS when this button panel is multi-select.
the CDF jsxids of the selected records.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user selects a record of this button panel.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record, null if a deselection event.
the CDF jsxids of the selected records.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user changes the selected records of this button panel.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user hovers the mouse over this button panel and before the spyglass displays. The event script must evaluate to the HTML content to display in the spyglass. Canceling this event prevents the spyglass from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the spied record.
the column that receives the spy action.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this button panel and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record.
the column that receives the menu action.
the menu to display.
record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtext: Before Append
record.jsxtip: Fires when the user adds a new CDF record using the auto record interface and before the change is committed. Any modifications made to properties on objRECORD are persisted. Canceling this event prevents committing the new CDF record.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the JavaScript object that becomes the CDF record.
After Append
record.jsxtip: Fires after the user adds a new CDF record to the model and view using the auto record interface.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF record that is appended.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user scrolls the data area of this button panel.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the direction of the scrolling, 'horizontal' or 'vertical'.
the position of the scrollbar in implied pixels.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this button panel is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this button panel before it is removed from the DOM.
